section.p: The act of performing a procedure to test (as a scratch test or a tuberculin test) for an allergic or immune response to a substance that is performed by administering the substance to or through the skin and that is used especially in detecting allergic hypersensitivity

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date time the skin test procedure

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique id given to the procedure

Contains exactly one [1..1] testCode with data type Code
What type of test will be given

Contains exactly one [1..1] skinTestObservation, where its type is Skin Test Observation
The results of the Skin Test
The results of the Skin Test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] subject, where its type is Patient

Contains exactly one [1..1] visit, where its type is Outpatient Visit
An encounter for the patient at one site within a specifie length of time.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Author
